text: hi everyone I'm Julie golzarian and I am
a solution architect here at AWS today
in this video snack episode I will
demonstrate creating custom vocabularies
for Amazon Connect contact lens I will
show you how to create custom vocabulary
files including syntax and headings how
to upload and process those files and
finally how to set it to be the default
vocabulary in this example our connect
administrator will use common acronyms
used frequently by the U.S Department of
Health and Human Services in the
healthcare Industries
our connect administrator knows that by
improving the accuracy of the domain
specific terminology she can improve the
speech-to-text engine in contact lens
Amazon Connect contact lens custom
vocabulary improves the accuracy of
speech recognition for product names
brand names and domain specific
terminology by expanding and tailoring
the vocabulary of the speech-to-text
engine in contact lens the file must
contain all four columns which are
phrase IPA sounds like and display as
but the phrase column is the only one
that must contain an entry on each row
all other columns can be left blank in a
given row you cannot have entries for
both IPA and sounds likes Fields you
must choose one or the other or leave
both blank
the display as column supports symbols
and special characters for example C
plus plus if you want to include numbers
in the phrase column you must spell them
out digits 0 through 9 are only
supported in the display as column
spaces are only allowed with the IPA and
display as columns do not use spaces to
separate columns columns must be tab
separate
once the file is created navigate to
Amazon connect find custom vocabularies
in the menu before you can add custom
vocabularies to Amazon connect you need
the analytics and optimization contact
lens custom vocabularies permissions
assigned to your security profile by
default in new instances of Amazon
connect the admin and call center
manager security profiles have these
permissions if you want to make a change
be sure to review documentation on how
to update your security profiles
choose add custom vocabulary enter a
name choose a language you can download
a sample file but in our case we already
have a file ready to import the
vocabulary states are ready by default
processing and deleting you can remove a
custom vocabulary if you attempt to
upload your vocabulary and your
vocabulary does not validate and is a
failed State double check your file for
tabs ensure no white space in the phrase
column and ensure the use of hyphens and
not white spaces in the phrase column to
view a custom vocabulary that has been
uploaded you download it and open the
file
navigate to the transcript summary and
review the resolved acronym in the
transcript the caller said AAA but this
resolved to Area Agency on Aging this is
a powerful feature and by adding your
custom vocabularies you improve expand
and tailor the vocabulary to your
business and ensure domain-specific
speech to text in contact lens now that
you know this can be done you can add
custom vocabularies for frequently used
brand names business terms specific to
your business
industry specific terminology plays a
critical role in effective communication
within each industry this feature is
great for medical terminology and
Healthcare Industries or financial terms
in finance technology Industries so many
use cases
let's deep dive into a live demo
we are logged in as an administrator
let's look at the security profile for
our call center manager let's scroll to
the call center manager and review his
permissions
scroll down to Analytics
and optimization
and ensure the check box next to custom
vocabularies is checked
now
click the save button and we have
ensured our call center manager has the
permissions he needs now to add your
custom vocabulary go back to the menu
under analytics and optimization
scroll to custom vocabulary
add custom vocabulary in the blue big
blue button
then give it a name
pick your language
and now choose your file that's ready to
be uploaded
click save and import and your
file is processing
you can find best practices for using
Amazon custom vocabularies in the Amazon
connect administrator guides and if you
